summary: This document is a summary of a call regarding a spreadsheet found on a Mar-a-Lago HR drive. It discusses Janine, an employee since 2007, who cannot authenticate the spreadsheet as a business record, and mentions her attorney Pat Pileggi who will coordinate with Mar-a-Lago counsel.

persons.name: Pat Pileggi
persons.context: Representing Janine in a matter related to a spreadsheet found at Mar-a-Lago; will talk to Mar-a-Lago counsel about records custodians or witnesses.

persons.name: Janine
persons.context: Has worked at Mar-a-Lago since 2007; found a spreadsheet on an HR drive but cannot testify it is a business record.

connections.description: Pat Pileggi is representing Janine in a legal matter regarding a spreadsheet found at Mar-a-Lago.

events.title: Call regarding Mar-a-Lago spreadsheet
events.description: A call took place discussing Janine's discovery of a spreadsheet on a Mar-a-Lago HR drive and her inability to authenticate it as a business record.

keyFacts: Janine, a Mar-a-Lago employee since 2007, found a spreadsheet on an HR drive but cannot testify it is a business record.
Attorney Pat Pileggi is representing Janine and will coordinate with Mar-a-Lago counsel regarding other possible records custodians or witnesses.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
